articles.author: Ian Casselberry
articles.title: WCWS Game 2: Texas Tech vs. Texas softball live updates, weather delay, news from the Women's College World Series - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: The Texas Longhorns will look to complete a series sweep over the Texas Tech Red Raiders in Game 2 of the WCWS Thursday night.
articles.content:
The 2025 Womens College World Series will go to a third and deciding game after Texas Tech evened the best-of-3 matchup with a 4-3 victory on Thursday night.
